030package javax.measure.test;
031
032import javax.measure.test.quantity.AreaQuantity;
033import javax.measure.test.quantity.DistanceQuantity;
034import javax.measure.test.unit.DistanceUnit;
035
036public class CircleInfo {
037
038    public static void main(String[] args) {
039        DistanceQuantity radius = new DistanceQuantity(30, DistanceUnit.cm);
040        System.out.println("Radius = " + radius);
041        double mult = 2 * Math.PI;
042        DistanceQuantity circumference = radius.multiply(mult);
043        System.out.println("Circumference = " + circumference);
044        AreaQuantity area = (radius.multiply(radius)).multiply(Math.PI);
045        System.out.println("Area = " + area);
046    }
047
048}
